rows.label: tlk4237017301_msg0001
rows.name:
Moruru, along with Master Sephrian,
will spread Pope Marveni-sama's will
throughout Alst, mo.

rows.label: tlk4237017301_msg0002
rows.name:
Words that can release one from
even the heaviest of sins...

rows.label: tlk4237017301_msg0003
rows.name:
Precisely because I have experienced it myself,
there must be something I can convey, mo.
